JobTitle: SEM Marketing Manager-Global Media Paid Search Team- MSA
JobFullDesc: Microsoft’s Global Media Paid Search (SEM) team is seeking a passionate Search Marketing professional who will guide the strategy, planning, execution, and measurement of Microsoft’s global paid search campaigns for our Commercial business campaigns such as Business Applications, Power Platforms, Education, Digital Transformation and more. Microsoft’s Global Media Paid Search (SEM) team is a diverse, collaborative, solutions-oriented team that partners across a wide set of colleagues, partners, and stakeholders within Microsoft. If you’re passionate about digital marketing and paid search, excited about connecting with B2B audiences, eager to learn and motivated to take on challenges, willing to grow by embracing new and different perspectives, this may be the role for you. ResponsibilitiesIn this role, you will:Collaborate closely with Global Media Campaign teams and with Product Marketing teams to advocate and develop Paid Search strategies that are part of holistic, multi-faceted paid media campaigns for Business Applications, Power Platforms, Education, Digital Transformation and other Microsoft Commercial and Consumer campaigns.Manage media agency relationships, collaborating with the agency on SEM campaign planning, overseeing the agency’s campaign execution, guiding keyword, bid, and creative optimizations, and ensuring that campaign results map to business goals.Be an SEM thought leader, delivering insights and helping educate stakeholders and partners across the Microsoft Marketing organization on the standards and business impact of paid search.Collaborate with Ad Operations technical specialists to enable campaign measurement and optimization.Be ready to have direct impact on Microsoft’s global portfolio of  Commercial paid search campaigns by working with colleagues on global keyword governance, messaging standards, and best practices.Recommend tests, collect and analyze data, identify trends and share insights to generate new opportunities for the business.QualificationsRequired skills and experience 3-5 years’ of experience managing SEM campaigns at an
